description: Base-4 digits are, in order, the first n terms of the periodic sequence with initial period 1,0,2.

Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (4,0,1,-4).
formula: G.f.: x*(1+2*x^2)/((1-x)*(1-4*x)*(1+x+x^2)). _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 22 2012a(n) = 4*a(n-1) +a(n-3) -4*a(n-4). _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 22 2012
